name: Glen Canyon Park Recreation Center
description: Features: - Accessible Children's Play Area - Accessible Picnic Area - Accessible Restroom - Athletic Field - Available for Rentals - Baseball / Softball - Basketball - Climbing Wall ($15.00 Add-on) - Community Room(s) - Natural Area - Pickleball (Indoor) - Ping Pong - Playground - Restrooms - Tennis Programs at this Site: Glen Park offers Tot Playtime, Pilates, Yoga-Vinyasa, Physical Conditioning for Seniors, Zumba, Book Group, Bingo, Pickleball, Badminton, Volleyball, Basketball, Parkour, Rock
